 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂוֺרָה‎</span> [[Isa.28.5|Isa 28:5]] probably dittograph for following <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂעֹרָה‎</span> (Koppe [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] and others; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] omitted); &gt; [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] and others ***in rows*** (adverb acc; but Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוּרָה‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>GGN 1889, 298</sup>; compare [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Landwirthsch. 41</sup> who favours <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> in Isaiah. More plausible would be some grain, as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שורה‎</span> Zinjirli Inscription, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>374</sup> Sachau<sup>Panammu 23</sup>).
